briefTitle: Longer-term Study of AR101 in Subjects Who Participated in a Prior AR101 Study (ARC008)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open-Label, Longer-Term Study of AR101 Characterized Oral Desensitization Immunotherapy in Subjects Who Participated in a Prior AR101 Study
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess AR101's safety, tolerability and efficacy over an extended dosing period.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment-emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) and Treatment-emergent Serious Adverse Events (TESAEs)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first dose of study drug through 30 days after last dose of study drug, up to 59 months
